name: Poker Mania
overview: Poker Mania, a casino video-poker style game a Reel Poker recreation was created by Andy Green of Green Lizard Productions and released in 1995. It is a poker variant of a fruit machine simulator. Including all aspects of poker, great playability and the frustration of real gambling. Don't weep as you lose your money, or smile too much as you use your skill and composure to win a bucket load of dosh. You start off with a few quid and must build your bank to £100 or over in order to progress to Pontoon.
